name: expletive
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
formal a word that is considered offensive: let out an expletive She dropped the book on her foot and let out a row/string of expletives. expletive deleted
used when an offensive word has been removed from a report of what someone has said: He ran at the officers, calling them (expletive deleted) and threatening them.
